Title: DNA Methylation Beta Values Matrix for DMRsegal
Description: Matrix of DNA methylation beta values from Illumina 450K array for 10 cancer and 10 normal samples. Beta values range from 0 to 1 representing proportion of methylation at each CpG site.
DataProvider: Center for Oncological Research, University of Antwerp

Title: Phenotype Data for DMRsegal Example
Description: Data frame containing sample phenotype information including sample group (cancer vs normal), age, and gender for 20 samples.
DataProvider: Center for Oncological Research, University of Antwerp

Title: Differentially Methylated Positions for DMRsegal
Description: Data frame of differentially methylated CpG sites identified by limma analysis comparing cancer vs normal samples, filtered at FDR < 0.05.
DataProvider: Center for Oncological Research, University of Antwerp

Title: Array Type for DMRsegal Example Data
Description: Character string indicating the Illumina array type (450K) used for the methylation data.
DataProvider: Center for Oncological Research, University of Antwerp
